title: Online Go Tour page 42 stuck in the past -- almost Remembrance Day 2009
body:
by **badourb**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Visit http://tour.golang.org/#42
2. Change the program to include the line:
	fmt.Println(time.Now())
3. Run the program

What is the expected output?
I would have thought the current time in some timezone.

What do you see instead?
2009-11-10 23:00:00 +0000 UTC

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
I don't know. I am running the online tour.

Which operating system are you using?
Linux, but the code is not running on my machine. I am running the online tour.

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
I don't know. I am running the online tour.

Please provide any additional information below.
